description: This file defines a React component named NotesList which displays a list of notes, grouped into pinned and other notes. It includes UI for selecting, pinning/unpinning, and deleting notes, utilizing imported time formatting library.

methods.name: NotesList({ notes, selectedId, onSelect, onDelete, onTogglePin })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a list of notes with options to select, delete, and toggle pin status, grouping pinned notes separately.

ctags.name: NotesList
ctags.pattern: /^export default function NotesList({ notes, selectedId, onSelect, onDelete, onTogglePin }) {$/
